Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir,

Mr. João Agostinho da Silva, owner of the cloths which, at the request of Your Excellency Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu, had been purchased, has come here to definitively handle them, as said citizen Abreu mentions in the enclosed letter, and I send him to the presence of Your Excellency.

The said citizen Abreu asks me to obtain from Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Lordship, Most Illustrious Sir Antônio Vicente da Fontoura, Minister of Finance. Domingos José de Almeida

It is in accordance. Domingos José de Almeida

Annex 2 to document CV-11.
